title: Drawing, "Design for a Wall Hanging "Feelings Like Shooting Seeds Covered by Soil of Wind Nourished by Life""
medium: Red crayon, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso:  Feelings like shooting seeds/coverd (sic) by soil of mind/nourished by life
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: On recto, four irregular square and pentagram-shaped panels suspended from horizontal support by red thread/wire that weaves in and out of suspended panels; on verso, three flowers sprouting from ground; upper left corner, three oval-shaped sprouting seeds.
